Accounts Officer Job at CEMCS




        
    

        
        CEMCS is Chevron Employees Multi-purpose Cooperative Society. As our name suggests, we were set up to serve the welfare and interests of Chevron Employees. Since inception, we have experienced steady business growth that has helped us earn trust from members and partners.
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    



Our business offers services that are tailored to meet our members' needs related but not limited to Travel & Tours, Real Estate, e-commerce, Loans, sale of commodities and insurance among a burgeoning profile of business ventures. Our Vision is to be the industry-leading Cooperative society in Africa. Our Mission is to consistently deliver superior and sustainable value to our members, the community and partners by leveraging available resources within the confines of applicable rules and regulations.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Accounts Officer

Job Location: Lekki, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Job Summary


	We are currently recruiting suitably qualified candidates to fill the position of an Accounts Officer who will work seamlessly with a team and be responsible for maintaining accurate financial records, data entry, reconciling general ledger accounts, and ensuring that all financial transactions are properly recorded and compliant with accounting standards.
	The accountant plays a key role in supporting financial reporting, audits, and internal controls within the Credit Society.


Key Objectives


	Ensure accuracy and completeness of financial records.
	Reconcile general ledger accounts and bank statements.
	Support month-end and year-end closing processes.
	Maintain compliance with cooperative financial regulations and accounting standards.


Core Responsibilities
General Ledger Management:


	Record and post journal entries for all financial transactions.
	Analyze and reconcile balance sheet and income statement accounts.


Reconciliations:


	Perform daily, weekly, and monthly reconciliations of general ledger accounts.
	Reconcile bank statements with ledger entries.


Financial Reporting:


	Assist in the preparation of financial reports for internal and external stakeholders.
	Provide documentation and support for internal and external audits.


Compliance & Controls:


	Maintain organized records and supporting documentation.


Qualifications


	Bachelor's Degree in Accounting, Finance, or Business Administration
	0–2 years of experience in accounting or financial operations
	Professional certification (e.g., ICAN, ACCA) is an advantage
	Familiarity with inventory systems, insurance accounting, and event budgeting.


Required Skills:


	Strong understanding of general ledger accounting
	Ability to learn GL reconciliation processes
	Ability to learn advanced Excel skills (pivot tables, formulas, financial modelling)
	Attention to detail and accuracy.


Note


	Kindly complete the form with relevant but concise details.
	You are required to upload your resume in the section provided for that.

  "@context": "https://schema.org",
  "@type": "JobPosting",
  "title": "Telesales Executive",
  "description": "PC Place is a Nigerian retailer specializing in computers, electronics, and accessories, with both an online store and physical locations. The company&#39;s head office is located in Ikeja, Lagos.

We are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Telesales Executive

Job Location:&nbsp;Ikeja, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

Responsibilities


	Lead Generation &amp; Customer Engagement: Actively identify and contact potential customers online and through phone to generate sales leads and build a client base.
	Product Expertise: Develop a thorough understanding of computer hardware, software, and peripherals to effectively communicate features, benefits, and technical specifications to customers.
	Sales &amp; Negotiation: Present products, answer customer questions, explain technical details, and negotiate prices and terms to secure sales.
	Customer Relationship Management: Maintain and grow profitable relationships with customers by providing excellent service, handling queries, and following up on leads and inquiries.
	Sales Target Achievement: Work independently or with a team to meet or exceed monthly or quarterly sales goals and drive revenue for the company.
	Market &amp; Trend Awareness: Stay informed about the latest technology trends, online marketing strategies, and competitor activities.


Essential Skills &amp; Qualifications


	Communication &amp; Customer Service: Exceptional ability to communicate effectively through various digital platforms and provide outstanding customer service.
	Technical Aptitude: Basic to strong knowledge of computers, software, and related IT terminology.
